div.div: Click here to register to receive our BCS text alerts. Or you can text the word @bremencs to 81010 from your mobile phone.

div.p: As parent(s) of a Bremen City Schools student(s), if you would like to receive periodic information emails from the school system, please sign up below.

div.div: Your email address will be kept confidential.

input.name: fca_eoi_error_texts_email
input.value: Error: Please enter a valid email address. For example "max@domain.com".

div.br:
Alumni Directory If you are alumni of Bremen City Schools, we would like to keep you informed. Please join our alumni directory.
Programs of Interest

br.div:
Bremen City Schools is a school district that is truly focused on excellence in all we do. We are proud to be a strong school system for our community and surrounding communities. Our elected board members are selflessly dedicated to improving our school district. We are also proud that our faculty, parents, and most important, our students, are among the best that the State of Georgia has to offer.
Our schools have consistently ranked among the best in Georgia for many years. Our students regularly perform at or near the top of the state's best scores in academics and other areas as well. Our arts program boasts multiple championships in literary and performance competitions. Our athletic programs are consistently competitive, and we possess multiple individual and team state championship titles.
Bremen City Schools has a long tradition of being one of the best K-12 school districts in the State of Georgia and we intend on making sure that continues. In order to continue to provide an excellent educational experience for our students and remain a point of pride in our community, we will remain focused on excellence in all we do.

div.em:
Bremen City Schools is an equal opportunity, affirmative action, educational institution and as such, does not discriminate in any manner concerning students, employees, or service to its community on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, disability, age, or national origin in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.
